snippet: R. A. Dickey pitched his fourth complete game of the season as the Mets ended a nine-game home losing streak Thursday, defeating Miami.
abstract: New York Mets defeat the Miami Marlins, 6-1; R A Dickey pitches his fourth complete game of the season.
lead_paragraph: R. A. Dickey pitched his fourth complete game of the season as the Mets ended a nine-game home losing streak Thursday, defeating Miami.

headline.seo: R. A. Dickey Wins 15th as Mets Get Rare Victory
headline.main: Rare Matinee, and an Even Rarer Mets Home Win
headline.print_headline: Rare Matinee, and an Even Rarer Mets Home Win
